ModMetaData.name: Rim Holstaur
ModMetaData.author: Sullos
ModMetaData.description:
Rim-Holstaur adds a new xenotype and faction focused on Holstaurs. Holstaurs are monster girls known for their laid back lives, delicious milk, and need to find a husband. The Holstaur tribe, is non-violent, rarely attacking humans. Should you find a holstaur, any colony would be very happy with their kind and loving nature they bring with them.
This mod requires Biotech, Ideology and Xenotype Patch Utils. This mod will work best with RJW, and RJW Genes. Gene adding mods such as RJW Genes, Alpha Genes, Big and Small, and Integrated Genes will add additional functionality and a more accurate representation of how Holstaurs and other monsters are intended to be - though the mod will work with or without any combination of these mods. Sized Apparel is supported for most apparel.
Credit for the original Bikini textures goes to TeH_Dav and Argon. Lore descriptions credit goes to Swobal.
